item.title: 巴拉圭期待下半年债务进一步去美元化的窗口期
item.description: 巴拉圭财政部长卡洛斯-费尔南德斯（Carlos Fernandez）表示，如果能以优惠利率将部分美元债务转换为期限较长的本币债券，巴拉圭可能会在今年下半年这样做。【原文：Paraguay might swap some of its US dollar debt for longer duration local currency bonds in the second half of the year if it can do so at favorable interest rates, Finance Minister Carlos Fernandez said.】

item.title: EyeCare Partners 即将达成债务交换和新融资协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，EyeCare Partners LLC 公司即将达成一项交易，在削减债务负担的同时，还能从一群债权人那里获得新的资金。【原文：EyeCare Partners LLC is nearing a deal that would slash its debt load while also providing it with fresh money from a group of creditors, according to people with knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 美国垃圾债券基金出现一年多来最大规模资金外流
item.description: 由于美联储对通胀的鹰派态度令投资者警惕，投资于美国企业高收益票据的基金出现了一年多来最大的资金外流。【原文：Funds that invest in US corporate high-yield notes saw the biggest outflow in more than a year as the Federal Reserve’s hawkish approach to inflation makes investors wary.】

item.title: 印尼财政部长旨在保护经济免受美元升值影响
item.description: 印尼财政部长表示，印尼政府正与央行行长佩里-瓦尔吉约（Perry Warjiyo）合作，以缓解美元升值对印尼经济的影响。【原文：The Indonesian government is working with central bank governor Perry Warjiyo to cushion the country’s economy from the rise in the US dollar, according to its finance minister.】

item.title: 日本首相铃木称，除利率差距外，日元还受 "各种因素 "影响
item.description: 日本财务大臣铃木俊一表示，与美国的利率差距只是影响日元的众多因素之一，日元对美元汇率正徘徊在 34 年来的低点附近。【原文：Japanese Finance Minister Shunichi Suzuki said an interest rate gap with the US is just one of many factors weighing on the yen, which is hovering around a 34-year low against the dollar.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚总统告诉波哥大居民，到别处去喝水吧
item.description: 哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）要求波哥大居民在周末离开该市，以缓解该市受干旱影响的水库所承受的压力。【原文：Colombian President Gustavo Petro asked Bogota residents to leave the city over the weekend to ease pressure on the drought-hit water reservoirs that serve the city.】

item.title: Acentra Health 降低私人债务再融资利率
item.description: Acentra Health LLC 下调了定期贷款利率，这是与一组私人信用贷款机构进行的更大规模交易的一部分，该交易对现有贷款进行了再融资，并筹集了更多债务。【原文：Acentra Health LLC cut its interest rate on a term loan, part of a larger transaction with a group of private credit lenders that refinanced existing loans and raised additional debt.】

item.title: 股票大跌后，特朗普媒体建议 "长期 "投资者挫败空头
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的社交媒体公司，其股票的飞速上涨让这位前总统在纸面上赚取了数十亿美元，但随后的快速抛售抹去了超过三分之二的涨幅。【原文：Donald Trump’s social media company, whose meteoric stock gains made the former president billions on paper before a rapid selloff wiped out more than two-thirds of the advance, took the unusual step of advising investors how to prevent bets against the firm.】

item.title: 图斯克称英国苏纳克不久将访问波兰讨论安全问题
item.description: 波兰总理唐纳德-图斯克周四表示，英国首相里希-苏纳克将 "很快 "访问波兰，讨论安全问题，北约领导人延斯-斯托尔滕贝格也可能一同到访。【原文：UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak will visit Poland “soon” to discuss security topics, and may be joined by NATO boss Jens Stoltenberg, Premier Donald Tusk said on Thursday.】

item.title: Oaktree 为第七期电力机会基金募集 25 亿美元资金
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）正寻求为其最新一期 Power Opportunities 基金筹集 25 亿美元。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management is seeking to raise $2.5 billion for the latest vintage of its Power Opportunities fund, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称，巨额债券赌注使一些对冲基金 "大而不能倒
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）称，一小部分基金在国债市场上积累了大量的空头赌注，以至于在出现压力时可能会破坏更广泛的金融体系的稳定。【原文：A small group of funds has accumulated such large short wagers in the Treasury market that they could destabilize the broader financial system during times of stress, according to the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 加州又有两家财产保险公司退出市场
item.description: 加利福尼亚州本已紧张的财产保险市场正面临新的挑战，因为又有两家保险公司，即 Tokio Marine America Insurance Co.【原文：California’s already strained property insurance market is facing a new challenge as two more insurers, Tokio Marine America Insurance Co. and Trans Pacific Insurance Co., plan to withdraw from the wildfire-prone state entirely starting in July.】

item.title: 三家私人信贷基金因问题贷款遭穆迪警告
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）本周让私人信贷投资者有更多理由担心这个价值 1.7 万亿美元的蓬勃发展行业的信贷质量。【原文：Moody’s Ratings this week gave private credit investors greater reason for concern about credit quality in the flourishing $1.7 trillion industry.】

item.title: 瑞士巧克力商投资可可种植业，应对供应紧张问题
item.description: 巴里-卡乐堡公司（Barry Callebaut AG）正在投资可可种植业，因为巧克力的主要原料价格飞涨，挤压了糖果商的利润。【原文：Barry Callebaut AG is investing in cocoa farming as prices for the key chocolate ingredient soars, squeezing profits for confectioners.】

item.title: 为什么如今似乎有那么多人服用阿德拉？
item.description:
这一蓬勃发展的毒品使用背后的力量。【原文：

The forces behind this booming drug use.

】

item.title: 业内资深人士预计 2024 年小额贷款销售额将高达 4,400 亿美元
item.description: 今年强劲的开局刺激了资深市政债券投资者约翰-米勒（John Miller）对 4 万亿美元州和地方政府债务市场销售额的预测。【原文：A strong start to the year is stoking veteran municipal bond investor John Miller’s prediction for sales in the $4 trillion market for state and local government debt.】

item.title: 沃尔玛支持的 Ibotta 在 5.77 亿美元首次公开募股后股价大涨 34
item.description: 数字营销软件公司 Ibotta Inc. 和一群股东在首次公开募股中筹集了约 5.773 亿美元，发行价高于市场定价范围，此后该公司股价攀升达 34%。【原文：Ibotta Inc. shares climbed as much as 34% after the digital marketing software firm and a group of shareholders raised about $577.3 million in an initial public offering priced above a marketed range.】

item.title: Ardian 即将达成收购 BCI 超过 10 亿美元私募股权的交易
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，法国收购公司 Ardian SAS 接近达成一项交易，从不列颠哥伦比亚投资管理公司（British Columbia Investment Management Corp.【原文：French buyout firm Ardian SAS is close to a deal to acquire more than $1 billion of private equity fund stakes from British Columbia Investment Management Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 图书馆服务公司酝酿合并，寻求私人债务交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，图书馆服务公司 Baker & Taylor 与 Media Source Inc.【原文：Library services companies Baker & Taylor and Media Source Inc. have held talks to combine and have approached direct lenders about financing for the potential deal, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 曾估值 120 亿美元的快递公司 Getir 考虑出售和退出市场
item.description: Getir 曾经是外卖初创企业界的宠儿，估值 120 亿美元，由于面临投资者要求减少损失的压力，它正在权衡资产出售和退出非核心市场的可能性。【原文：Getir, once a darling of the delivery startup world valued at $12 billion, is weighing asset sales and potential exits from non-core markets as it faces pressure from investors to cut its losses.】

item.title: 特朗普-拜登复选和降息决策前资产支持债券销售飙升
item.description: 由于借款人急于在美国大选造成信贷市场混乱之前获得资金，华尔街的证券化引擎正在加速运转，发行量达到创纪录的水平。【原文：Wall Street’s securitization engine is revving up with issuance touching record levels as borrowers rush to secure funding before any credit market disruptions caused by the US general election.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称沙特阿拉伯需要接近 100 美元的油价
item.description: 据国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）称，由于 "欧佩克+"（OPEC+）领导人带头减产，沙特阿拉伯今年需要的油价将高于此前的预期。【原文：Saudi Arabia will need a higher oil price than previously thought this year as the OPEC+ leader spearheads the group’s production cuts, according to the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 吉利将出售 13.2 亿美元沃尔沃卡车股票
item.description: 中国浙江吉利控股集团正在出售其在卡车制造商沃尔沃公司（Volvo AB）的全部 B 类股票，这些股票在斯德哥尔摩收盘时价值 144.6 亿瑞典克朗（约合 13.2 亿美元）。【原文：China’s Zhejiang Geely Holding Group is selling the entirety of its Class B shares in truckmaker Volvo AB that were worth 14.46 billion Swedish krona ($1.32 billion) at the close of trading in Stockholm.】

item.title: 阿根廷中央银行行长包斯利即将访华
item.description: 阿根廷中央银行行长圣地亚哥-包西利（Santiago Bausili）计划在未来几周作为一个大型代表团的成员访问中国。【原文：Argentine Central Bank President Santiago Bausili is scheduled to travel to China as part of a large delegation in the coming weeks, according to a person with direct knowledge of the trip who asked not to be named discussing sensitive matters.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司推迟原定于周五进行的业务计划更新
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water Utilities Ltd）推迟了原定于周五进行的业务计划更新。【原文：Thames Water Utilities Ltd has postponed an update to its business plan originally scheduled for Friday, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧莱雅业绩反弹，欧洲和北美市场抵消了中国市场的疲软
item.description: 欧莱雅公司（L'Oreal SA）公布的第一季度销售额好于预期，原因是欧洲和北美市场的强劲表现帮助抵消了中国消费者需求的放缓。【原文：L’Oreal SA reported better-than-expected first-quarter sales as strength in Europe and North America helped offset a slowdown in Chinese consumer demand.】

item.title: 南非央行行长卡尼亚戈称新任期将使央行不受大选周期影响
item.description: 南非储备银行行长莱塞特贾-克甘亚戈（Lesetja Kganyago）表示，下个月的大选将解决南非政治前景的不确定性，而关于大选对央行意味着什么的问题已经有了答案。【原文：South African Reserve Bank Governor Lesetja Kganyago said uncertainty about the country’s political outlook will be resolved by next month’s election, while questions on what it means for the central bank have already been answered.】

item.title: Centuri 首次公开募股融资 3.15 亿美元，伊坎交易后上涨 13
item.description: Centuri Holdings Inc. 在首次公开募股和同时进行的私募定价达到市场定价范围的最高点后，股价最高攀升了 13%。【原文：Centuri Holdings Inc. shares climbed as much as 13% after an initial public offering and concurrent private placement priced at the top of a marketed range.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率飙升至 11 月以来最高点，达到 7.1
item.description: 美国的抵押贷款利率今年首次突破 7%。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US climbed past 7% for the first time this year.】

item.title: 高盛本周推出永久票据交易后的新债券
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is marketing investment-grade bonds, just two days after issuing perpetual notes, as the bank taps investors following its surprisingly strong first-quarter results.】
